name: controls.web.audio.AudioBuffer
text: Object, which can then be populated by data, and played via an AudioBuffer

length.text: Read only integer property representing the length, in sample-frames, of the PCM data stored in the buffer.

channelsCount.text: Returns an integer representing the number of discrete audio channels described by the PCM data stored in the buffer.

sampleRate.text: Read only real property representing the sample rate, in samples per second, of the PCM data stored in the buffer.

duration.text: Read only real property representing the duration, in seconds, of the PCM data stored in the buffer.
